## Table.Builder.update() method

Update anything but cells/downward growing cells/slots, because these need to be kept in sync.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
update(update: {
            element?: Element;
            width?: number;
            height?: number;
            slots?: Array<Array<Option<Cell.Builder>>>;
            rowGroups?: Iterable<RowGroup>;
            colGroups?: Iterable<ColumnGroup>;
            rowGroupHeaders?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
            columnGroupHeaders?: Iterable<Cell.Builder>;
        }): Builder;
```

|  Parameter | Type | Description |

|  update | { element?: Element; width?: number; height?: number; slots?: Array&lt;Array&lt;Option&lt;[Cell.Builder](./alfa-table.cell.builder.md)<!-- -->&gt;&gt;&gt;; rowGroups?: Iterable&lt;[RowGroup](./alfa-table.rowgroup.md)<!-- -->&gt;; colGroups?: Iterable&lt;[ColumnGroup](./alfa-table.columngroup.md)<!-- -->&gt;; rowGroupHeaders?: Iterable&lt;[Cell.Builder](./alfa-table.cell.builder.md)<!-- -->&gt;; columnGroupHeaders?: Iterable&lt;[Cell.Builder](./alfa-table.cell.builder.md)<!-- -->&gt;; } |  |
